alert.note: Alert for Southern Grafton; Sullivan (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 6:32PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Sullivan County through 715 PM EDT... At 632 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Claremont, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Claremont, Charlestown, Newport, Grantham, Cornish, Lempster, Acworth, Goshen, Croydon, Sunapee, Unity and Springfield. This includes Interstate 89 between mile markers 37 and 44. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
